post.body: If @1938media thinks you don't matter, I would say he matters even less. Sad diatribe from him ... sigh.
What podcasts do you listen to?
Ah ... maybe a cell drop then ... or some such garbled your message.
But I love using it ....
Twitter is evil ... lol!
Look on your Twitter page, it is definitely your end :)
The new satellite system coming to SNI in 2009 has that all built in plus paperless logging.
WTF was that? :)
No, you are right, yet I see it all the time at truck stops. Fire up and pull out -- no pretrip.
I watch that occasionally.
I do a thorough pretrip 99% of the time. We have a checklist that is only checked off if something is defective.
What are the odds of having two cell phone profiles ... I am Canadian and have one cell for U.S. and one for Canada?
Happens a lot out here this time of year ...
G'Night all .... - http://bkite.com/03lIu
Brrrr! -15F here right now ... rest time :) - http://bkite.com/03lmN
The Great Canadian Pumpkin is planted at Minot - http://bkite.com/03lmz
Brrr, -15F. Change in plans ... relaying load in Kansas City, K. - http://bkite.com/03kAU
The Great Canadian Pumpkin is planted at Chamberlain - http://bkite.com/03kAO
Good Morning all. Time to head out for the day. Target, Fargo, ND :) - http://bkite.com/03knZ
